config-constructor.description: A hash of config name (keys) and a callback (values) that is used to create the config. If the config is created from another config, append that config name after the callback separated with a '#' sign.

config-path.description: A path to add to the config locations.

locale-path.description: A path to add to the locale messages locations.

module-path.description: A path to a module or a collection of modules.

autoconfig-filters.description: A callback to alter the autoconfig during get_autoconfig().

app-root.description: The root directory of the application paths.
